game.name: Deirdre
game.desc:
Deirdre is an Action Roguelike game where you fight a looping Gauntlet of Bosses.
One day, a group of tormented prisoners with weapons formed together to get their revenge on the Goddess of Time and her Angels. Over time, they have discovered the magical attributes of Torque. The essence of spin would fuel Deirdre’s Domain the same way Time fuels ours. The heroes would enchant their arsenal with Torque, allowing stronger methods to torment their enemies back. Will they be able to break Deirdre’s curse? Or are they truly hopeless against Time…
